item.title: Helldivers 2 CEO Steps Down and Moves to New Role
item.description:
Highlights

  • Johan Pilestedt has stepped down as CEO of Arrowhead Game Studios to focus on Helldivers 2, appointing Shams Jorjani as the new CEO.
  • Helldivers 2 exceeded expectations by selling 12 million copies in 12 weeks, leading to significant company growth.

Arrowhead Game Studios CEO and Helldivers 2 Director Johan Pilestedt has announced he is stepping down from his position to become the studio's Chief Creative Officer. Pilestedt hopes the move will allow him to focus more on Helldivers 2 and its community.

Since its launch in February, Helldivers 2 has performed exceedingly well . Sony recently confirmed that Arrowhead's third-person shooter reached 12 million copies sold in its first 12 weeks, making it Sony's fastest-selling PlayStation release ever. Naturally, this has led to significant growth at Arrowhead, straining Pilestedt's ability to dedicate time to his studio's biggest hit. It seems the former CEO chose to take this issue into his own hands.

Related
Helldivers 2 Mechs Could Be the Golden Ticket To One Missing Weapon Type

The addition of mechs in Helldivers 2 has been awesome to play, but the feature could actually be taken even further in combat.

Pilestedt said on Twitter that Shams Jorjani has replaced him as Arrowhead's CEO. Jorjani spent 12 years at Paradox Interactive in various leadership roles, and also has experience working as chairman for an indie publisher and as an advisor for multiple game companies. Pilestedt explained that over the last year, he has been pulled more and more towards the business side of Arrowhead, reducing the time he has to help with the studio's creative efforts. Pilestedt believes that Jorjani's arrival will be good for Pilestedt himself, the company, and Helldivers 2 's continued development, as his new CCO role allows him to dedicate all of his focus towards Arrowhead's newest game and its flourishing community.

Arrowhead Game Studios' New CEO

There are other new changes surrounding Arrowhead and its approach to Helldivers 2 , as a community manager recently announced that Helldivers 2 's developers plan to take more time than usual with the next update, a trend that could continue with future patches according to the manager. The update in question is expected to mostly focus on weapon balancing, an area that can prove to be quite finicky, especially in a shooter like Helldivers 2 .

But it seems that Arrowhead has much more planned for Helldivers 2 than just balancing updates. A recent leak showcased one of the enemies from Helldivers 2 's unreleased faction , the Illuminate. The faction appears to be a middle point between the more range-focused Automatons and the melee-focused Terminids, as the Illuminate apparently possess both ranged and melee capabilities.

It's still not known when Helldivers 2 's Illuminate faction will be added, but it's possible that Pilestedt's move to CCO could help boost development efforts, not just for the Illuminate but for all future Arrowhead content. Arrowhead has made it clear that it views Helldivers 2 as a live-service title that will continue to receive updates for the foreseeable future.

item.title: Star Trek Movies Might Still Be Alive According To New Update
item.description:
Highlights

  • Paramount is making progress on a new Star Trek movie with Simon Kinberg on board.
  • The film will focus on the formation of Starfleet and humanity's first contact with aliens.
  • The news of Kinberg's involvement has excited fans and promises new narratives and challenges.

Paramount is finally making strides with its new Star Trek movie and has brought in acclaimed filmmaker Simon Kinberg to help bring the project to life. Initially, it was revealed that Toby Haynes would be helming the project, but since then, there hasn’t been any major update regarding the title.

In January 2024, it was announced that Paramount was working on a Star Trek film that would take the franchise into a new direction. At the time, Haynes had been chosen to direct the film, with Seth Grahame-Smith slated to write the script. However, things went silent after the announcement and once again, fans didn’t know if they would ever be able to see another Star Trek film on the big screen or not. Now, a recent report has indicated that Paramount is finally moving ahead with the project and has roped in a big name to elevate the project.

RELATED
Star Trek Actor Believes Fourth Movie In The Franchise Might Finally Be Happening

One Star Trek actor is still hopeful that the fourth film in the franchise might happen soon and the original cast might return too.

According to The Hollywood Reporter , the production giant is in negotiations with Kinberg to produce a Star Trek feature film for the big screen. If everything works out well, the filmmaker could take on creative roles in other films of the storied franchise. The report also mentioned that the project will be set decades before the events of the JJ Abrams movie that was released in 2009. Additionally, it might primarily focus on the formation of the Starfleet and humanity’s first contact with alien life. However, the report also made it clear that the project was already in active development at Paramount and Kinberg would be joining in to work on it. As of now, there is no change to the movie crew. Haynes will still direct, Grahame-Smith will write the script, and Abrams will produce, just like it was announced in January.

This movie isn't connected to the previously planned Star Trek sequel that had been on hold for a while. That sequel was supposed to be the fourth movie in the new series and bring back most of the original cast, including Chris Pine as Captain Kirk. Unfortunately, there's no news on when that movie might happen. Recently, Pine opened up about the film’s future and gave an uninspiring update about it. In a recent interview, Pine said that he had no idea what’s happening with the alleged fourth film in the Star Trek franchise. He said, “I thought there was already a script, but I guess I was wrong, or they decided to pivot. As it's always been with Trek, I just wait and see.”

The news of Kinberg attached to the new Star Trek project is encouraging and should serve as a sigh of relief among the fandom. It would be interesting to see how the makers would explore a new era in Star Trek history, potentially showing the early days of human and Volcan cooperation . Also, it would give fans a chance to dive deeper into events that were not seen before, offering a chance for new narratives and challenges. However, it would also bring a lot of challenges because fans might not want to see a project that doesn’t exist in existing timelines. Nonetheless, the news of a prequel film has definitely made fans excited.

All films in the Star Trek franchise are available for streaming on Paramount+.

MORE
Star Trek: World War III, Explained

Before humanity mastered the final frontier, they fought an internal conflict that claimed a third of the species and almost ended Earth.

Source: The Hollywood Reporter

item.title: Elon Musk Mocked by Streamers Following Twitter Streaming Push
item.description:
Highlights

  • Twitter under Elon Musk has made significant changes, including adding livestreaming features, sparking mixed reactions among users.
  • Elon Musk's attempt to mock Twitch's content backfired as top streamers pointed out Twitter's own issues with inappropriate content.
  • While some users question Twitter's viability as a livestreaming platform, others highlight key features needed for creators to switch over.

Elon Musk has received backlash in the form of mockery in response to a post he made about Twitch content while promoting the new Twitter livestreaming function. Musk's livestreaming plans for Twitter have drawn the attention of content creators, audiences, and businesses, but this latest commentary from the Twitter CEO may have done more harm than good.

Purchased by Elon Musk in April 2022 to the tune of $44 billion, Twitter has served as one of the most popular and heavily used social media sites across the globe. Frequently referred to as "the bird app," in reference to its initial blue bird logo, Twitter has seen a number of drastic changes following the acquisition by Musk. While some users have been appreciative of certain innovative changes, the addition of a livestreaming feature has raised eyebrows, with a recent post from Musk sparking polarizing conversation.

Related
Elon Musk Is Getting Sued for $128 Million

Twitter CEO Elon Musk faces a $128 million lawsuit, raising eyebrows among audiences and sparking conversations about the executive's decisions.

Remarking on multiple instances of controversial content being streamed on Twitch, Elon Musk made a Twitter post intended to mock the livestreaming platform, but his plan backfired and was quickly turned around on him and Twitter. The post showed an image from The Simpsons , in which the characters Mr. Burns and his assistant Smithers walk up to a building with a Twitch logo marquee, only to enter and find themselves in a strip club. Twitch has faced backlash over the years for allowing content that some users consider to be inappropriate for the platform, with many questioning the enforcement of the Twitch community streaming guidelines . However, top streamers clapped back at Musk's tweet, with Ludwig, Dream, Hasan, and MoistCr1TiKaL pointing out the hypocrisy of the CEO laughing at inappropriate content when Twitter has been inundated with NSFW reply bots for months.

Is Twitter A Viable Livestreaming Platform?

While a vast majority of replies to Elon Musk's Simpsons tweet commented on the irony of the CEO's joke, a few users did in fact discuss the viability of Twitter as a livestreaming platform. One user shared a list of necessary changes that they would like to see before considering making the switch to streaming on Twitter, noting monetization, bot termination, and discoverability as key features to draw in creators. In terms of technical prowess, Elon Musk streamed Diablo 4 on Twitter in September 2023 to test and showcase the capabilities of livestreaming on the social media site. Twitter may be viable for streamers in terms of providing the basic software elements, but many remain weary about the long-term potential if the platform continues to ignore its struggles with bots.

Content creators big and small continue to test the various livestreaming platforms, from Twitch and YouTube to Kick and now Twitter, with each platform offering pros and cons. As controversies surrounding livestreaming sites pop up left and right, it remains to be seen if Twitter will fully stand as a competitor in the space.

item.title: Rumor: Sony Days of Play Promotion Leak Reveals Start Date
item.description:
Highlights

  • PlayStation's Days of Play promotion is rumored to start next week, offering discounts on games and hardware.
  • Price cuts are expected for PlayStation Plus memberships and accessories, and PS5 prices might see a $50 drop as well.
  • The Days of Play event could coincide with the rumored May 2024 PlayStation Showcase, hinting at exciting game reveals for fans.

A credible leaker has claimed that PlayStation 's annual Days of Play promotion will reportedly kick off next week. The event will allegedly offer a wide array of discounts and deals for PlayStation games and hardware, and may lend credence to the mounting rumors of an impending PlayStation Showcase in May.

Days of Play has become a highly anticipated event for PlayStation users in recent years. The annual promotion typically features a major PlayStation Store sale with discounts on a broad variety of games, making it a prime opportunity to snag popular titles at reduced prices. Price cuts for PlayStation Plus memberships, as well as select hardware accessories are also available during Days of Play event periods.

Related
Silent Hill 2 and Every Rumored Game For PlayStation's May Event Explained

PlayStation is rumored to be having an event in May to showcase upcoming games, including Silent Hill 2 along with a few other potential titles.

According to a Dealabs report published by reliable insider billbil-kun, the 2024 Days of Play event is set to kick off next Wednesday, May 29, and run up until June 12. The report also lists some potential discounts for various PlayStation products, such as a flat 25% reduction for all PlayStation Plus tiers, a €100 price drop for the PlayStation VR2 headset, and DualSense controllers, excluding the premium DualSense Edge variant, receiving a price cut to €50. Sony has confirmed PC support for the PS VR2 later in the year, so the rumored price drop is quite tantalizing for the capable headset.

Those Waiting for a PS5 Price Drop May Be in Luck

Rather surprisingly, the PS5 console itself could finally see an enticing price cut as well, with both the disc and digital editions claimed to be receiving a €50 (possibly $50 USD) drop in price. Considering the recent report that revealed nearly half the PlayStation userbase hasn't upgraded to the PS5 yet, the 2024 Days of Play might be the perfect opportunity for those waiting to buy the current-gen console at a reduced price, as well as take advantage of the game discounts to bolster their purchase.

It's also worth pointing out that PlayStation's Showcase events have usually lined up with Days of Play promotions. Interestingly, the rumored start date for the 2024 Days of Play promotion period aligns with previous rumors hinting at a PlayStation Showcase happening around the same timeframe, speculated to be at the end of May. Industry insider Nick "Shpeshal Nick" Baker is the latest to add to the pile of rumors, suggesting a potential PlayStation event set to air on May 28. With the growing heap of reports and just over a week left before May ends, an official PlayStation Showcase announcement from Sony may very well be imminent.

item.title: Rise of the Ronin Releases Big New Update
item.description:
Highlights

  • Rise of the Ronin's newest patch introduces fresh content like new missions and set bonuses, enhancing the gameplay experience.
  • Players can now switch styles more easily, expand combat options, and enjoy adjusted weapon stats in Rise of the Ronin.
  • The update also adds the Path of Chaos mode for dynamic enemy placement.

Rise of the Ronin has launched a massive update for PlayStation 5. The new patch brings fresh, never-before-seen content to Rise of the Ronin and gameplay improvements featuring new quality-of-life additions. Additionally, the update also fixes bugs and makes adjustments to both weapons and characters.

Rise of the Ronin is the latest title from Team Ninja, responsible for developing games like Ninja Gaiden and Nioh . Since its release, Koei Tecmo, the parent company of Team Ninja, has been betting big on Rise of the Ronin, claiming that presently the game is outselling the two Nioh games. To keep the flame alive, the developer has released several updates for Rise of the Ronin , some fixing bugs and issues and others adding new content.

Related
How Rise of the Ronin's Open-World Map Compares to Skyrim

Despite being somewhat influenced by The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim's map, Rise of the Ronin's open-world map takes a somewhat different approach.

As announced by Team Ninja on Twitter, Rise of the Ronin has just received a new update, version 1.05. The patch is split between adding content, fixing bugs, and adjusting gameplay. In terms of content, the game has received five new Ally Missions, the ability to level sync when using Rise of the Ronin's Testament of the Soul , and two new set bonuses in the Midnight difficulty. Plus, players replaying the world in Midnight can now choose a Public Order to deteriorate, which translates to resetting enemy camps previously liberated and possibly repeating fights with a Fugitive.

Rise of the Ronin Latest Update Patch Notes

Regarding gameplay improvements, the new patch allows players equipped with the same weapon type in both slots to expand their number of combat styles to six. Changing styles on various occasions, such as guarding an enemy attack or during a Flash attack, will also be possible. Many weapons in Rise of the Ronin , such as the katana, bayonet, and saber, have received adjustments, either in the form of buffs or nerfs. Allied characters also had some improvements in their unique attack stats.

Lastly, the new update adds something called Path of Chaos, which boils down to saying that "each playthrough will have different enemies." Apparently, it seems to be a new dynamic mode that swaps enemy placement, although it is unclear how this will work in practice. The latest update is already available on PlayStation 5 to all players.

Team Ninja's producer and director, Fumihiko Yasuda, commented on how Rise of the Ronin connects with Nioh and Ninja Gaiden . According to Yasuda, many of the shared elements lie in the costumes and combat styles. Ryu Hayabusa's outfits, like the Hayabusa-ryu combat style, were inspired by Ninja Gaiden . As for Nioh , most of the Western references were inspired by William's model, and the protagonist himself appears in Rise of the Ronin . The Nioh-ryu combat style would feature the three iconic stances of Nioh , but Team Ninja changed it to fit Rise of the Ronin's gameplay.

Rise of the Ronin Update 1.05 Patch Notes

New Content

  • “Midnight” difficulty: Added new Ally Missions.
  • Team up and improve local security in Unruly Areas: “Thugs: Honmachi”, “Thugs: Honjo”, and “Thugs: Honnoji”.
  • “Path of Chaos”: Each playthrough will have different enemies.
  • “Eternal Night”: The most difficult mission thus far.
  • Added new set bonuses “Ferocious Tiger” and “Prodigious Dragon”. Masterwork armor and accessories will now have a chance to drop with these new Set Bonuses separately from other set bonuses.
  • “Prodigious Dragon” set bonuses:
    • Last Ditch Counterspark
    • Enemy Max. Ki (Grapple Attack)
    • Neutral Combat
    • Upgraded Counterspark

  • “Ferocious Tiger” set bonuses:
    • Blade Flash Attack
    • Upgraded Forward Dodge
    • Attack ↑ (Martial Skill Swap)
    • Ki Regeneration (Blade Flash)

  • Added new training opponents, such as your Blade Twin, and bosses that were only available in bond missions.
  • Added new glider appearances that can be obtained from Formidable Foes of the Foreigner faction: “Glorious Crimson”, “Elegant Brown”, and “Imperial Blue”.

New Features

  • Added feature to manually reset Unruly Areas based on completion rate of a chapter on “Midnight” difficulty.
  • Added system where you can level sync missions that you have completed on “Midnight” difficulty.
  • When equipping the same 2 main weapon types (e.g., 2 Katanas), you can now equip different styles for each weapon individually.
  • Can now register “Jizo Statuette” for item preset loadouts.
  • Number of times Martial Skills hit is now added to technical points in Training.
  • Now shows difficulty in the results screen of Training, as the higher the difficulty, the higher the possible score will be.
  • Added filtering for Training.
  • Progressing cat collecting will now place cats that can be pet around Usugumo Dayu in Yokohama, Edo, and Kyoto.

Weapon Adjustments

  • Adjusted so Violent Gale and Flash attack is easier to do after certain martial skills.
  • Katana: Yagyu Shinkage-ryu – Follow-up attack after counterspark is now easier to land.
  • Katana: Nioh-ryu – Adjusted so you are less likely to accidentally trigger “Nioh-den Iai Quickdraw” when performing Veiled Arts after Blade Flashing.
  • Katana: Nioh-ryu – “Nioh-Den: Iai Quickdraw” consumes less Ki, and overall increase in damage and Ki damage.
  • Katana: Aisu Kage-ryu – “Crimson Light” consumes less Ki, and at max blood gauge, damage and Ki damage is increased.
  • Saber: British Training – Reduced Ki consumption of throwing knife, and increased damage.
  • Bayonet: Mumyo-ryu – “Bone Shatter” now easier to follow up with critical hits on enemies with depleted Ki.
  • Bayonet: French Training – Follow-up shot after counterspark is now easier to hit.
  • Oxtail Blade: Mumyo Kaishin-ryu – “Midnight Banquet” now easier to follow up with critical hit on enemies with depleted Ki.
  • Great Sword: Mumyo Kaishin-ryu – “Midnight Mist” is now easier to hit.
  • Unarmed: Mumyo-ryu – “Raging Wolf” is now easier to hit.

Character Adjustments

  • Adjusted player knockback distance on successfully countersparking enemy attacks.
  • Now possible to switch styles when: Guarding enemy attacks, during some animations of being hit by enemy attacks, and during Flash Attack.
  • Calling your horse while sprinting will continue the sprint after mounting the horse.
  • Adjusted and improved stats of unique attacks of Ally characters across the board.
  • Adjusted so that you will no longer switch lock on targets when controlling the right stick with the combat style UI showing, during Critical Hits.

Enemy Adjustments

  • Shortened flaming area that certain bosses create.
  • Adjusted and nerfed Bayonet bullet damage and stats of certain enemies.

Other Adjustments

  • Increased chance of obtaining Masterwork equipment from formidable foes.
  • A portion of main weapon and sub weapons can now have set bonuses.
  • Adjusted so that equipment that specific equipment that had limited ways of obtaining to now drop from enemies as well.
  • Can now overwrite set bonuses when bond transferring on Masterwork equipment.
  • When selecting equipment for bond transferring, equipment that cannot be selected is now filtered to not show.
  • Items that heal status ailment is now affected by Skill “Bolster Duration ↑” and Technology Development “Inventory ↑”.
  • Can now obtain the unique accessories by triggering the Veiled Vow dialogue event, and no longer need to commit to the Veiled Vow.
  • Dialogue lines played after breaking a Veiled Vow now resets after certain conditions.
  • “Fertilizer” purchased from Robert Fortune is now cheaper.
  • Increased the types of material you can purchase from Robert Fortune and Alexandria Moreau.
  • Increased “Red Nuts” gain when gardening.
  • Can now change the time in the Redesign menu.
  • “Midnight” difficulty, Edo: Location hubs – Yoshinobu Tokugawa, Taka Murayama, and Hachiro Kiyokawa will now appear in their hubs.
  • Shintaro Nakaoka will now appear at Choshu Clan Estate in Kyoto when using the Testaments of the Soul.
  • Adjusted to increase chance of encountering other player’s ronin avatars at towns or roads.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed bug where you could bond transfer despite lacking materials or money through an unconventional method.
  • Fixed bug where you could not purchase Coal from blacksmiths.
  • Fixed bug where “Blade Twin’s Kimono” and “Modernizing Vassal’s Kimono – Belt” were not shown as selectable pieces.
  • Fixed bug where each equipment sometimes were shown in different colors each.
  • Fixed bug where “Current Equipment” showed default appearance under certain conditions.
  • Fixed bug where saving and loading before arriving at Kannai disabled Chance Encounters until arriving at Kannai.
  • Fixed bug where Veiled Arts set for other styles would have different stats compared to the original.
  • Fixed bug where some Martial Skills would ignore guard.
  • Fixed bug where you would be forced into swimming when performing certain Martial Skills nearby water.
  • Fixed bug where while using Martial Skill “Blossom Blizzard”, if you take damage from certain enemy skills will make you unable to dodge out of it.
  • Fixed bug where in Nioh-ryu, switching to middle stance would sometimes switch to high stance.
  • Fixed bug where after drop down assassinations, performing certain martial skills would cause you to take fall damage.
  • Fixed bug where Ki Blaze effect would vibrate excessively.
  • Fixed bug where when using Ally Alexandria Moreau, her grapple throws were not matching the indicator.
  • Other minor fixes.
